title: FPS Knife Pack
description: This pack contains 5 AAA quality game ready meshes and 10 texture sets for your Unreal FPS project.
longDescription:
This pack contains 5 AAA quality game ready meshes and 10 texture sets for your FPS project. Each knife model's quality and polycount are equal to current FPS game standards. You get 4K textures for Hi-Res fidelity with each knife having 2 versions, one texture is realistic while the second is a fun "skin" variation.

Your purchase includes high resolution PBR textures that were created and exported out of Substance Painter for the Unreal Engine. All textures and meshes are in folders that are labeled with easy to understand naming conventions.

Features:

- D-80/M9 Phrobus Bayonet mesh and texture (Alternate Gold Skin)

- Karambit mesh and texture (Alternate Fade/Rainbow Skin)

- Primitive Dagger mesh and texture (Alternate Magma Skin)

- Survival Knife mesh and texture (Alternate Patina Skin)

- Kabar Knife mesh and texture (Alternate Urban Camo Skin)
technicalDetails:
Texture Size: 4096x4096, 2048x2048: We offer Hi-Res Textures to give you the freedom to down res them to fit your project.

Physically Based Rendering: Yes, each variation comes with a Base Color, RMA Packed, and Normal map.

Scaled to Epic skeleton: Yes

Collision: No, there are several ways you may approach the Collision for a melee weapon, we'll leave that up to you.

Vertex Count: Low-poly FBX files are included, ranging from 2.3k-3.8k tris, and are exported using compatible Unreal settings. All meshes Blades point down Y+Axis.

LODs: ** LOD's, Joints, Animations, VFX, Custom Collision and Sounds are NOT included. **

Number of Meshes: 5 individual knife meshes.

Number of Materials and Material Instances: 2 materials for each knife, 10 overall.

Number of Textures: 3 texture maps for each material, 30 overall.

Supported Target Build Platforms: These models could be used on any platform, but polycount and texture sizes are optimized for PC and Consoles.

Documentation: Check it out before you buy! https://skfb.ly/68LGY Check out our website: http://vert-candy.weebly.com/

Important/Additional Notes: It is assumed you have the basic knowledge to handle meshes and materials. If not, you may have to follow Unreal Engine's official documentation. If you have tried online documentation and still have questions, leave a message on VertCandy's Facebook pageÂ https://www.facebook.com/VertCandy. We'll try to solve your problem as soon as possible.
